nodes.text: In Their Own Words: The Cast on the Making of Episode II

In Their Own Words: The Cast on the Making of Episode II is an article written by Mark Newbold that appeared in Star Wars Insider 136 in 2012. The article celebrates a decade since the release of Attack of the Clones with a number of new and archive interviews.
Newbold interviewed Daniel Logan, Jesse Jensen, Mike Quinn, Nalini Krishan, Rena Owen, Anthony Daniels, Nick Gillard, Veronica Segura, Bonnie Piesse, and Temuera Morrison.
